about.companyDescription: Specialists in heavy equipment operations, directional drilling, and transportation services for major global companies in infrastructure, energy, and utility sectors.

milestones.description: Established the company with the goal of providing specialized heavy equipment and transportation services for major projects
Expanded heavy equipment fleet and added advanced machinery to meet complex project requirements
Integrated latest technologies into operations and maintenance to improve efficiency and performance
Committed to adopting sustainable and environmentally friendly practices across all operations

services.title: Three Pyramids Services
services.subtitle: Comprehensive Construction and Transportation Solutions
services.closingDescription: Three Pyramids is committed to providing comprehensive, high-quality solutions that meet and exceed your construction and transportation requirements.
services.mainDescription: Specialized in Heavy Equipment Operations and Transportation Services for Major Projects

servicesList.title: Heavy Equipment Operations
servicesList.description: Comprehensive heavy equipment services including excavators, loaders, and dump trucks for water, gas, sewage, and agricultural line extensions
servicesList.fullDescription: We provide comprehensive heavy equipment services with the highest quality and efficiency standards. Our scope of work includes using the latest equipment and technologies across various engineering and infrastructure projects. We possess a fully integrated fleet of specialized heavy equipment for excavation and leveling, infrastructure network extension, work in agricultural and industrial projects, and handling various terrains with high efficiency

servicesList.title: Transportation and Vehicle Services
servicesList.description: Supply of various vehicle types for transporting employees and engineers of global companies, and waste transportation vehicles for gas and oil companies
details: Transportation of Engineers from General Electric and Novabeni
Waste Transportation Vehicles for Gas and Oil Companies
Employee Transportation for LNG Gas Companies
servicesList.fullDescription: We provide comprehensive and specialized transportation solutions for major global companies. Our expertise spans over a decade in providing distinguished transportation services for energy and industrial sectors. We offer diverse services including employee and engineer transportation, specialized vehicle provision for global companies, integrated vehicle fleet management, and specialized transportation services for gas and oil companies

servicesList.title: Specialized Vehicle Fleet Management
servicesList.description: Comprehensive fleet management and vehicle services for diverse industrial and infrastructure projects
servicesList.fullDescription: We provide comprehensive transportation services tailored to meet the unique requirements of our clients, ensuring smooth and efficient mobility solutions across various sectors and project types
